mapper.select: SELECT l.l_id, l.l_stu_id, l.l_state, l.l_leave_type, l.l_reason, s.s_name, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS l_start_time, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS l_end_time, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,l_start_time,l_end_time)+1 AS days FROM t_leave AS l INNER JOIN t_student AS s ON s.s_id = l.l_stu_id INNER JOIN t_user_teacher AS ut ON ut.ut_user_id = #{user_id} AND s.s_zone_id = ut.ut_zone_id INNER JOIN t_user_student AS us ON us.us_stu_id = s.s_id ORDER BY l.create_time

SELECT l.l_id, l.l_stu_id, l.l_state, DATE_FORMAT(l.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d") AS create_time, l.l_leave_type, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_start_time,"%Y-%m-%d") AS l_start_time, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_end_time,"%Y-%m-%d") AS l_end_time, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_approval_time,"%Y-%m-%d") AS l_approval_time, uw.uw_open_id, s.s_name FROM t_leave AS l INNER JOIN t_user_student AS us ON us.us_stu_id = l.l_stu_id INNER JOIN t_student AS s ON s.s_id = l.l_stu_id INNER JOIN t_user_weixin AS uw ON uw.uw_user_id = us.us_user_id WHERE l.l_id = #{id}
SELECT NAME FROM sys_user WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT z_name FROM t_zone WHERE z_id = ( SELECT z_parent_id FROM t_zone WHERE z_id = ( SELECT z.z_parent_id FROM t_zone AS z INNER JOIN t_user_teacher AS ut ON ut.ut_zone_id = z.z_id AND ut.ut_user_id = #{user_id} ) )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_leave SET l_state = #{approval}, l_replay_reason = #{replay}, l_approval_time = SYSDATE() WHERE l_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT l.l_id, l.l_stu_id, l.l_state, l.l_leave_type, CASE WHEN l.l_replay_reason='' THEN 'æ— ' ELSE l.l_replay_reason END AS l_replay_reason, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_approval_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS l_approval_time, s.s_name, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS l_start_time, DATE_FORMAT(l.l_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS l_end_time, TIMESTAMPDIFF( DAY, l_start_time, l_end_time ) + 1 AS days FROM t_leave AS l INNER JOIN t_user_student AS us ON us.us_user_id = #{user_id} AND l.l_stu_id = us.us_stu_id AND l.l_state != 0 INNER JOIN t_student AS s ON s.s_id = us.us_stu_id ORDER BY l.create_time

SELECT z_name FROM t_zone WHERE z_id = ( SELECT z_parent_id FROM t_zone WHERE z_id = ( SELECT z_parent_id FROM t_zone WHERE z_id = ( SELECT s_zone_id FROM t_student WHERE s_id = ( SELECT us_stu_id FROM t_user_student WHERE us_user_id = #{user_id} ) ) ) )
SELECT uw_user_id FROM t_user_weixin WHERE uw_user_id = #{openid}
